At 9:29, it should be "and DP is increased" instead of "and USED is increased", sorry for a mistake.

Timestamps: 1:45 solution 1, 5:48 implementation, 8:22 solution 2, 11:00 implementation.

Hey Errichto, Can you make video about
this problem?
https://codeforces.com/contest/1142/problem/B

Thanks in advance.

You can solve the HARD problem in O(q log q + q*5*5)!
First, while some interval is contained inside another, greedily eliminate the smaller interval. Then apply dp as you said, but we lose one dimension because the difference between the indexes of the current interval and the last used interval is at most 5.
Best Tutorial ,, Hope for more Tutorials On C,D Problems after Contest(for codeforces only :-D ).
